original_text: Then the chief priests and the elders of the people gathered in the palace of the high priest, whose name was Caiaphas,
korean_text: 그 때에 대제사장들과 백성의 장로들이 가야바라 하는 대제사장의 관정에 모여

sentences.original_text: Then the chief priests and the elders of the people gathered
in the palace of the high priest
